amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, sought to prohibit the illegal possession or discharge of firearms in public housing zones except in cases of self-defense.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 45 as printed in the Congressional Record to add penalties for illegally possessing or discharging a firearm if the violation occurs within a public housing zone.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Durbin amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 106 - 318 (Roll no. 158).
